message.content:
cs.CR, cs.HC, cs.SE, cs.MM, cs.SI 

This paper discusses the threat of phishing attacks in mobile applications and proposes personalized security indicators as a solution. The paper focuses on the security and usability aspects of the proposed solution, which are relevant to the categories of computer security (cs.CR), human-computer interaction (cs.HC), software engineering (cs.SE), multimedia (cs.MM), and social and information networks (cs.SI). However, since the paper primarily deals with security issues, cs.CR is the most likely category.
